text: Arnie Paul Robinson Jr. (April 7, 1948 â€“ December 1, 2020) was an American athlete. He won a bronze medal in the long jump at the 1972 Olympics and a gold medal in 1976.Arnie Robinson. sports-reference.com Robinson was born in San Diego, California. Robinson died on December 1, 2020 at the age of 72.Olympic Long Jump Gold Medallist Arnie Robinson Passes Away at 72 ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American track and field athletes Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from San Diego
